required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective Observational Study to Evaluate the Safety of COVID-19 Vaccination in Children and Adolescents

collaborator.agency: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

brief_summary.textblock:
This is a prospective, observational study. During the study, children and adolescents (ages ≥ 5 to < 16) will be followed post administration of mRNA COVID-19 vaccines.
Injection site (local), systemic reaction, and unsolicited adverse event data will be assessed on vaccination day and during the 7 days following each vaccination using either identical web-based or paper diaries, depending on study participant preference.
At Duke University, Cincinnati's Children Hospital, and Kaiser Permanente Northern California, serum samples will be collected for assessment of antibody titers to COVID-19. Each participant will have baseline (within 3 days of vaccination) serologies obtained and immunogenicity assessment at 28 (+7) days after each dose.
All participants will be followed for 180 days after each dose for serious adverse events and adverse events of special interest.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with defined local or systemic reactogenicity events after each dose of COVID-19 vaccine
primary_outcome.description: Tables summarizing each solicited local and systemic reactogenicity event by maximum classification (none, mild, moderate, and severe), as well as by moderate or severe

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with at least one severe (Grade 3) solicited local or systemic reactogenicity event after each dose of COVID-19 vaccine
primary_outcome.description: Tables summarizing each severe (Grade 3) solicited local and systemic reactogenicity event

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with at least one moderate-to-severe (Grade 2-3) solicited local or systemic reactogenicity event after each dose of COVID-19 vaccine
primary_outcome.description: Tables summarizing each moderate-to-severe (Grade 2-3) solicited local and systemic reactogenicity event

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with an unsolicited adverse events after each dose of COVID-19 vaccine
primary_outcome.description: The number and percent and descriptions of unsolicited adverse events observed

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with an adverse event of special interest
primary_outcome.description: The number and percent of individuals who had at least one adverse event of special interest

primary_outcome.measure: The number and percent of participants with at least one serious adverse event
primary_outcome.description: The number and percent of serious adverse events observed and description of each event

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with defined local or systemic reactogenicity events after receiving other routinely recommended vaccines with each dose of COVID-19 vaccine
secondary_outcome.description: Tables summarizing each solicited local and systemic reactogenicity event by maximum classification (none, mild, moderate, and severe), as well as by moderate or severe

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with defined local or systemic reactogenicity events after receiving COVID-19 vaccine without other vaccines
secondary_outcome.description: Tables summarizing each solicited local and systemic reactogenicity event by maximum classification (none, mild, moderate, and severe), as well as by moderate or severe

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with at least one severe (Grade 3) solicited local or systemic reactogenicity event after other routinely recommended vaccines with each dose of COVID-19 vaccine
secondary_outcome.description: Tables summarizing each severe (Grade 3) solicited local and systemic reactogenicity event

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with at least one severe (Grade 3) solicited local or systemic reactogenicity event after receiving COVID-19 vaccine without receiving other vaccines
secondary_outcome.description: Tables summarizing each severe (Grade 3) solicited local and systemic reactogenicity event

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with at least one moderate-to-severe (Grade 2-3) solicited local or systemic reactogenicity event after receiving other routinely recommended vaccines with each dose of COVID-19 vaccine
secondary_outcome.description: Tables summarizing each moderate-to-severe (Grade 2-3) solicited local and systemic reactogenicity event

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with at least one moderate-to-severe (Grade 2-3) solicited local or systemic reactogenicity event after receiving COVID-19 vaccine without receiving other vaccines
secondary_outcome.description: Tables summarizing each moderate-to-severe (Grade 2-3) solicited local and systemic reactogenicity event

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with an unsolicited adverse events after receiving other routinely recommended vaccines with each dose of COVID-19 vaccine
secondary_outcome.description: The number and percent and descriptions of unsolicited adverse events observed

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with an unsolicited adverse events after receiving other routinely recommended vaccines with each dose of COVID-19 vaccine without receiving other vaccines
secondary_outcome.description: The number and percent and descriptions of unsolicited adverse events observed

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with an adverse event of special interest who received other routinely recommended vaccines with each dose of COVID-19 vaccine
secondary_outcome.description: The number and percent of individuals who had at least one adverse event of special interest

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with an adverse event of special interest who received other routinely recommended vaccines with each dose of COVID-19 vaccine without receiving other vaccines
secondary_outcome.description: The number and percent of individuals who had at least one adverse event of special interest

secondary_outcome.measure: The number and percent of participants with at least one serious adverse event who received other routinely recommended vaccines with each dose of COVID-19 vaccine
secondary_outcome.description: The number and percent of serious adverse events observed and description of each event

secondary_outcome.measure: The number and percent of participants with at least one serious adverse event who received other routinely recommended vaccines with each dose of COVID-19 vaccine without receiving other vaccines
secondary_outcome.description: The number and percent of serious adverse events observed and description of each event

arm_group.description: Children and adolescents (ages ≥ 5 to < 16) who receive mRNA COVID-19 vaccine per standard of care

study_pop.textblock: 320 healthy male or female ≥ 5 years to < 16 years of age

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Children ≥ 5 years to < 16 years of age
2. Receiving an authorized or approved and recommended COVID-19 vaccine per standard of care
3. Parent/legal authorized representative (LAR) willing to provide written or electronic informed consent per local IRB requirements
4. Participant willing to provide assent per local IRB requirements
5. Intention of being available for entire study period and complete all relevant study procedures, including follow-up phone calls
6. English or Spanish literate.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Participation in a COVID-19 vaccine interventional trial
2. Any condition, which, in the opinion of the investigators, may pose a health risk to the subject or interfere with the evaluation of the study objectives.
3. Anyone who is a relative of any research study personnel.

facility.name: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

condition_browse.mesh_term: Drug-Related Side Effects and Adverse Reactions
